info.author: Espen Moe-Nilssen
info.description:
Introduction
============

This is a plugin for `TinyMCE`__ editor for Plone.
__ http://plone.org/products/tinymce/

It is trying to add a "place gallerybutton" for collective.plonetruegallery and collective.gallery
You must whitelist "iframe' in safe-html
You must also enable "background" and "overflow" id you want to use those options

Changelog
=========

0.0.1 alpha
--------

* Initialversion

0.0.2 alpha
--------

* Added a few options, like setting width and height of gallery.


TODO
====

A lot... including
A good uninstall GS step.
Right now you must manually restore your default TinyMCE configuration.

Credits
=======



Authors
=======

Espen Moe-Nilssen

Changelog
=========

0.0.1alpha (2010-07-25)
-----------------------

* initial release
info.name: medialog.tinymceplugins.placegallery
info.summary: A not so advanced TinyMCE plugin for handling links to galleries
info.html_description:
Introduction
============

This is a plugin for `TinyMCE`__ editor for Plone.
__ http://plone.org/products/tinymce/

It is trying to add a "place gallerybutton" for collective.plonetruegallery and collective.gallery
You must whitelist "iframe' in safe-html
You must also enable "background" and "overflow" id you want to use those options

Changelog
=========

0.0.1 alpha
--------

* Initialversion

0.0.2 alpha
--------

* Added a few options, like setting width and height of gallery.
